snippet: Robert G. Kaiser, a veteran Washington Post reporter and author, explains how the Dodd-Frank bill inspired his pessimism about Congress’s ability to address big problems.
abstract: Robert G. Kaiser, a veteran Washington Post reporter and author, explains how the Dodd-Frank bill inspired his pessimism about Congress’s ability to address big problems.

headline.main: Q. and A.: Is Congress Broken?

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
